name: Crazy Cars (Stevgtv)
description:
In this game you are in a car and you are trying to escape from the police patrols. If the police do not manage to catch you within 160 seconds you are free!

Firstly  you can change the car's direction with left and right arrows.To move the car you have to hold the numbers 1,2 or 3 on your keyboard, according to the speed you want to move.

Note: After downloading this game you have to open Scratch in order to be able to play the game .

I hope you like it ;)

Have fun!
